issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Base UI>Views>Table Views>Row data from sections, I scrolled the tableview up and the header row moved off the screen at row 4.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Table Views>Row data from sections
3) Scroll down

Result:
Header leaves the screen at with row 4

Expected:
Header remains on screen unless another header displaces it

Notes:
Also occurs  in 1.7.2
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Views>Table Views>Row data from sections, table header scrolls off screen at row 4

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
